settings.title: Materials
settings.content: Emma smoothly combines high-quality materials to create a dream-like mattress that conforms to every body type. Through the combination of our extensive research and advanced foam technology, Emma offers the comfiest sleep possible. Emma mattresses offer comfort point-elastic caving that enables an ideal and unique fit for your body. As a result, your spine stays straight while at the same time offering you the necessary amount of support and comfort.

settings.title: Certifications
settings.content: Our top-of-the-line foams are all CertiPUR-US¬Æ certified, meaning, they are made without any ozone-depleting chemicals and safe from VOCs, formaldehyde, and phthalates.

settings.note: *For queen sizes only. All prices and information from public sources listed as of July 18, 2023 for Douglas Alpine and Endy Hybrid. Information may not reflect updated prices and promotions.

settings.title: Emma Hybrid Comfort
settings.desc:
Perfect comfort for everyone

Our newest 13-inch Hybrid mattress that can support added weight and movement without getting hot or stuffy

  • Ultra-breathable and refreshing, no more overheating
  • 7 ergonomic zones for optimal spinal alignment
  • Enhanced support for every size and weight
  • Ideal pressure distribution
  • Zero motion transfer
settings.caption_headline: The mattress that can hold its own
settings.caption_content: Designed to provide perfect support, maximal comfort, and stay cool while you sleep

settings.title: Extra strength to provide optimal support
settings.content: Perfect for all types of sleepers, and activities that need the added reinforcement, the mattress can easily support all body types while maintaining its resilience so that you don‚Äôt sink too deep into the mattress.

settings.title: No more sweaty nights
settings.content: Designed with a plush and moisture-wicking cover, the Hybrid Comfort is climate-regulating and creates a cool sleep environment. The Airgocell foam allows heat to dissipate away from your body allowing you to fall asleep at the ideal temperature every night.

settings.title: Undisturbed sleep with zero motion transfer
settings.content: Made with an open-celled foam that isolates motion, light sleepers can continue to snooze even as their partner tosses and turns in bed. The combined springs in the Hybrid Comfort also help hold the structure of the mattress during movement.

settings.title: Developed by experts¬†
settings.content: The Hybrid Comfort was developed by a team of sleep experts and researchers, bringing top-notch technology to Canada. We know that the quality of your sleep is a long-term investment. Our products are built to last, having been tested and approved in our laboratories.

settings.title: Breathable and moisture-wicking Top cover
settings.desc: The Emma cover is soft-to-touch, making it very comfortable to lie on. Built with light fibers, our cover wicks away moisture away and prevents heat from getting trapped on the surface.

settings.title: The Breezy Airgocell¬Æ foam
settings.desc: Our signature Point Elastic Airgocell technology absorbs and releases excess body heat and moisture, creating an ideal sleeping environment for peaceful sleep.

settings.title: The cool foam layer that isolates motion
settings.desc: Find comfort in any sleeping position. Memory foam molds to the unique shape of your body for even pressure distribution and provides great motion isolation so you can sleep undisturbed, even with a fussy partner

settings.title: The Supportive HRX foam
settings.desc: Durable HRX foam supports you with just the right level of firmness, without hollows or bumps. Lie back and move freely until you've found your position for a deep sleep.

settings.title: The Ergonomic, 7-Zone edge-to-edge pocket springs
settings.desc: Say goodbye to restless nights! Our individually-wrapped coils are designed to enhance airflow and provide the optimum level of tension and bounce all over the mattress ‚Äî strong enough to support sleepers of all shape and size. Rest comfortably as our pocket springs adapt to your spine for longer and deeper restorative sleep.

settings.title: The stabilizing layer
settings.desc: Long-lasting mattresses need a good foundation. Our base is built to last, providing added stability for decades of quality sleep.

settings.title: The resistant, anti-slip, lower cover with handles
settings.desc: Innovative mattress lower cover, designed with exceptional durability and a convenient handle for effortless maneuverability.

settings.heading: Emma Hybrid Comfort - Layer by Layer

settings.desc:
Our Most Awarded Memory Foam Mattress for Budget-Conscious Sleepers

  • Most awarded mattress and budget-friendly

Our Top-Rated Plush Hybrid Mattress for Demanding Sleepers

  • Top-rated plus hybrid for maximum comfort
  • 7 unique layers with zero motion transfer
  • Cooling for hot sleepers

Our Newest Mattress, Offering Personalized Comfort for Every Type of Sleeper

  • Our newest technology with maximum comfort and support
  • Adjustable firmness on either side
  • Titanium-infused foam for extra cooling and optimal pressure relief

settings.title: Sleeping will never be the same
settings.subtitle: Experience rave-worthy comfort on a mattress that suits your every sleep need

settings.title: How does the Hybrid Comfort feel?
settings.subtitle: MATTRESS FIRMNESS SCALE
settings.description: On a 1-10 scale (soft to firm), the Hybrid Comfort is a 6 (medium firm). This means that you‚Äôll feel the cloudlike comfort of modern memory foam while still having just the right amount of support to protect your back and hips as you sleep soundly through the night.

settings.title: High quality mattress!
settings.content: I have used Emma Mattress for more than a month now and I'm totally in love with it. The quality of the mattress and comfort is definitely noteworthy. I would highly recommend using Emma if you are looking for premium quality mattress
settings.author: Javeria A.

settings.title: Excellent hybrid mattress
settings.content: Excellent mattress, not too firm and not too soft, either! I got the pillow too, which I got to adjust by taking out one layer. I'm a side sleeper so the flexibility here was a gamechanger for me
settings.author: Ben A.

settings.title: Best quality sleep I've ever had!
settings.content: I didn't realize how bad my previous mattress was until I received my Emma mattress. Not only do I sleep straight through the night (mind you, I sleep with my partner and dog and don't feel their movements at all!), I wake up energized and well rested. I no longer have any body aches and never feel too hot/too cold. Highly recommend!
settings.author: Jonathan W.

settings.title: Great for couples
settings.content: We've tried orthopedic mattresses in the past, but returned it because they're TOO firm. I prefer soft ones, while my husband prefers firm. For some strange reason, this mattress just works for the both of us. His back pain's gone and I've been sleeping like a log every night!
settings.author: Donna C.

settings.title: Uninterrupted sleep all night
settings.content: This was recommended to me by my friend since I've been waking up in the middle of the night with my old mattress. So glad I listened cuz now I've been sleeping straight and waking up without a sweat
